column8:
Leon Bakst (born as Lev Rosenberg) was a Russian artist who made his carrer in France as a painter then costume deisgner and stage scene artist for theatre & ballet.

The Wolf was painted in 1921 as a Costume design for ballet "The Sleeping Beauty".
